name: Blur Balls
description:
Shoot balls at enemies or your screen will get so blurred that you won't see anything !

Protect your base !

Protect your base where you can create projectiles. If an enemy touches your base, you die and it's game over !

Try to get the best score possible !

Share your best score with your friends. Or you post it in the comments below or on the Discord server and try to be the first !

Customize your game !

You can switch between 10+ different and unique color palettes ! And more of these are coming.
